modName: Master of Weapons - All in One
summary: Combines all the MOW weapons in one download.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36528-1-1370100758.png[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36528-1-1372236823.png[/img]
[link]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37623/?[/link]
Hey Guys,
This is All my downloads in one.
****** I have updated this mod recently, and added lots more weapons.full list below******
####Please Endorse!####
Fishing Pole<--------------------------------Fishing Pole Weapon Mod.esp

Lumberjack\'s Hook<-----------------------Lumberjack\'s hook.esp
Lumberjack\'s Saw

Embalming Brain Pick<--------------------Master Of Weapons - Embalming tools.esp
Embalming Scalpel
 Embalming Knife

Bloody Bone<-------------------------------Master Of Weapons - More.esp
Bloody Spine
Goat Leg
Horker Tusk
Rabbit Meat
Broom
Clothes Iron
Pitchfork
Shovel
Small Shovel
Flagon
Flute
Fork
Knife
Ladle
Mead
Cast Iron Pot
Tankard
Wine Bottle



***********AS USUAL, YOU HAVE TO TAKE THE UNUSABLE ITEM TO A FORGE AND CRAFT A USABLE VERSION..****************
:) :) :) :O :P :) :O

ENJOY!!!


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FISHING ROD
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36467-1-1369664746.png[/img]
you can pick up fishing rods(outside the Riften house, \"Honeyside\".), and yes, use them as weapons(like assassins creed).
well they have pretty low stats,(come on, its just a piece of wood with a hook!)
they are craftable at a forge,(under wood).






---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LUMBERJACK\'S HOOK AND SAW
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36489-1-1369735171.png[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36489-2-1369735171.png[/img]
this is just a little mod i made, where you can use the hooks as weapons.
stats are similar to Steel Dagger.
they are craftable at a forge,(under Steel).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EMBALMING TOOLS
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36503-1-1369756845.jpg[/img]

you can use the Embalming Tools as weapons.
they are craftable at a forge,(under Ebony).
*actually you cant fight with the ones found in tombs(they are MISC item, you have to go to forge and convert it to Weapon.
There are two recipes for each, one recipe is using ebony and leather, the other is using the corresponding MISC item.

*******DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND, I HAVE ADDED  THE WEAPONS TO  The serial killer in Windhelm*********
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

author: Daren
